Parameters:

splitClade

double splitClade(Clade parent,
                  Clade[] children)
Splits a clade into two sub-clades according to the importance distribution

Parameters:
parent - - the clade which is split
children - - a call by reference parameter which is an empty, two element array of clades at time of call and contains the to sub clades afterwards
Returns:
the chance for this split

getTreeProbability

double getTreeProbability(Tree tree)
Calculates the probability of a given tree.

Parameters:
tree - - the tree to be analyzed
Returns:
estimated posterior probability in log
